name: The Mark H. Zangmeister Center Reviews

review.title: “I had a very good experience working for MOOH. I would recommend them to a colleague or friend.”
review.pros: Pros – Working in the outpatient setting is nicer than working in a hospital, they had up to date technology, no weekend work, and mostly good people. Upper management is fair and approachable.
review.cons: Cons – In our current economy healthcare is changing rapidly, Medicare is making a lot of cuts and there is a lot of uncertainty working in freestanding healthcare centers.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – I don't have any.
